Body:
t = '18:01:46 up 62 days, 18:27,  1 user,  load average: 0.09, 0.04, 0.05'
monkeypatch.setattr(Connection, 'run', lambda self, x, err_stream, timeout,
    warn: get_mock_ssh_text(t, 0))
ssh_ctx = ssh.SshContext('ubuntu', get_mock_key_file(tmpdir))
with pytest.raises(NotImplementedError):
    ssh.LoadAverageValidation(ssh_ctx, hosts=hosts).expect_exit_code(1
        ).perform({})
